Keywords: Avengers , Brotherhood of Mutants , Detective , Mystical , X-Men
Real Name: Wanda Maximoff
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
RALLY (1): Friendly Attack Rolls. When an opposing character within range and line of fire makes an attack, you may remove Scarlet Witch's RALLY die and replace a die in the attack roll with it.
WITCH'S SIGHT: Outwit, Probability Control.

Comments
February 6, 2022
Poison1981
This Witch wreaks havoc every time I used her. If you want to watch a game get totally shut down, put a Witch on both teams. Prob down the dial, outwit at the top, good defensive powers, 3 18 defenses, steal energy at the back? And that one? That one is insane. I hate that it has no flight as well....just doesnt seem like the character....but the piece is sick regardless. I watched someones meta tier ranker where one of the rankers suggested this was a "bad overcosted piece". Everyone else thinks its one of the best pieces in the set and maybe the best Witch ever made...5 star for me
January 21, 2022
Maxphyte
Was using the chase Sentry and he kept missing horribly on some important attacks. Thankfully they stacked up Scarlet Witch’s Rally die count.
January 21, 2022
A.O.D.
Really wish she had flight, other than that she is fantastic
January 21, 2022
Maxphyte
She does so much every time I play her. Just got done in a game where I was having a bit of trouble against Empyre chase Deadpool who kept healing off his last click. It finally came down to a point where Scarlet Witch could see him on his attack while having Rally die. All I needed was a 1 to show up on one of the finalized dice rolls to essentially win the game. I never thought they would be able to top UXM with making a great Scarlet Witch. This Scarlet Witch is by far the most fun to use while still significantly contributing to winning the match.
January 13, 2022
Disasstah
[QUOTE=The Singularity;12174654]Played against her. SO ANNOYING. I had a few D6 rolls where one was like a 5 and the other a 1, now it's a crit miss. 3 times.[/QUOTE] That ability of hers is wild. Stacking those dice becomes handy since you're able to use the ability multiple times in a turn. Can't think of anyone else that can do that.
